Edited October 9, 2014 by goldenpeach

It's all about staging. You want to decouple your missile at the same time you fire it off. To do this you need to have all of the appropriate engines in the same stage as your decoupler. Something else you can do is tweak the thrust on the back seprotrons so that your front ones are profiding more force, which will cause it to pitch down, instead of trying to push the whole thing clear all at once.
